hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "The worst of all mankind is the double-faced one, who comes to some people with one face and to others, with another face

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُكْرَهُ مِنْ ثَنَاءِ السُّلْطَانِ، وَإِذَا خَرَجَ قَالَ غَيْرَ ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: Praising the Sultan and saying differently after leaving him
